Text.val: fetch DEBTOR_HELLER
fetch DEBTOR_HELLER with DEBH_LEGALOWNER
test if creditlimits are allowed
test if there is already a credit limit request, CLCR_REQSTATUS < 5 (decided)

Pushbutton handling
there is already a credit limit request
call online program if there is no request
call ODC001 with the DEBC_NO of legal owner
//leave program
call ODC1101, so start request
// update this variable with 'R' because from this program we want to
// start the creditlimit request
... if the second cancel button is pressed, we only
activate ODC110A , so only leave transaction !
-- 7. Test "Removed credit limit" (is implemented as first test, historical
-- 1. Test "Client has status END"
-- 2. Test "Creditlimits not allowed" (only implemented as warning)
-- 3. Test "Credit limit already exits at debtor ..."
-- 4. Test "Finance limit already exits at debtor ..."
-- 5. Test "No credit limits allowed on this debtor", leave program
-- Test 8: If v.limittype="F" and GNRL_CODE <> PL then give error: Finance limits not allowed
31.10.2005 MW SCR#9387 --> Changed the init-value of v.CurrencyRequested for PL
update, if automatic decision possible
requested currency does not exist
update variables, if validation and button 2 disabled
place cancel here because of the raise event of ok button
no valid textcode
call BDC205

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DEBC_DEBC from :1/DEBC join :1/CLNT on CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO = :3 where DEBC_DEBH = :4 and DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null and not(DEBC_CREDITLIMIT is null) and DEBC_NO <> :5 group by DEBC_DEBC
